item.title: [+3535] Optical illusion [PIC]
item.description: That actually had me for a few secs.

item.description: Best sites for fun, learning, creating and much more.

item.title: [+1468] Kate Beckinsale Gets the Megan Fox Treatment (Sorta SFW Vid)
item.description: ...and gets named Esquire's Sexiest Woman Alive. Sexy video shot with the world's most high-tech camera, just like that Megan Fox video from the summer. Time to drool again...

item.title: [+1183] From now on we'll be friends forever [PIC]
[+1119] A True Geek's Final Resting Place [PIC]
item.description: For my recently departed brother (long illness, don't smoke!), I thought this nice SPARCstation would be a cool place to spend eternity. Yes, he's really in there (after cremation). I kept the floppy drive cover but for space reasons removed the floppy drive, hard drive, and most of the power supply.

item.title: [+1014] Joe Scarborough: Thank You, Mr. President
item.description: Count me as one conservative who is disappointed that President Obama's hometown will not be hosting the 2012 Olympic Games.

item.title: [+901] Mahmoud Ahmadinejad Revealed To Have Jewish Past
item.description: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's vitriolic attacks on the Jewish world hide an astonishing secret.A photograph of the Iranian president holding up his identity card during elections in March 2008 clearly shows his family has Jewish roots.A close-up of the document reveals he was previously known as Sabourjian – a Jewish name meaning cloth weaver.

item.title: [+844] Conservatives Revel In America's Olympic Defeat | TPM
item.description: When the International Olympic Committee voted against Chicago's bid for the 2016 Olympics this morning -- after the President and First Lady flew to Copenhagen to push for it in person -- the Weekly Standard newsroom burst into applause. Cheers...

item.title: [+832] When Lobsters Seek Revenge [pic]
[+753] Halo ODST: Rated M For More Of The Same Crap (Parody Video)
[+677] On Healthcare, One Democrat With Backbone: Rep. Alan Grayson
item.description: Rep. Alan Grayson is standing up like a real man should to the GOP attacks on health care reform. This freshman Florida Congressman boldly and succinctly laid out the Republican plan for health care reform late Tuesday night. It’s his Wednesday follow-up that’s raising eyebrows on both sides of the aisle.

item.title: [+644] Why You Can't Get Decent Earphones for Less Than $100
item.description: Crappy earbuds are killing music. It's true. The problem is that good earbuds, like speakers, aren't cheap. Here's why.

item.title: [+617] Computer Makers Aim to Banish Boot-Up Time
item.description: In the time it takes your computer to boot up, you can probably make some toast or a cup of tea before the thing is ready to use. In the near future, you may not even have time to check your watch.

item.title: [+597] Wheelchair-Bound Hero Tackles Sex Offender in Walmart
item.description: Despite his injuries from falling off a roof, Cameron tackled the perv and held him down till cops arrived.

item.title: [+536] Jon Stewart on CNN's Texting and Driving Hypocrisy (Video)
item.description: CNN wants you to understand the dangers of texting while driving and download their new iPhone app so you can check traffic reports from the road.

item.title: [+530] Wi-Fi signals used to see through walls
item.description: The researchers say that the variation of radio signals in a wireless network can reveal the movements of people behind closed doors or even a wall.

item.title: [+525] Awesome water ride stunt [Animated Gif]
[+489] 7 Hilariously Failed Attempts at Politically Correct Toys
item.description: Who's better to handle sensitive racial and social issues than toy makers? As it turns out, just about anyone.

item.title: [+458] 65+ Must See Resources Especially For Designers
item.description: We obviously cannot cover all the best from the web, but we have tried to cover as much as possible.

item.title: [+433] Why Fit Guys Can Still Eat Pizza
item.description: Other foods, you eat. Pizza, you experience. But is it healthy?
